caption.title: Cytotoxic effects of S. amplexicaulis extracts on (A) MCF-7, (B) WEHI-164, and (C) HUVEC. The cells were treated with different concentrations of extracts for 12, 24 and 48 h. Cytotoxicity was measured by MTT assay. Data are presented as the mean Â± SEM of three independent experiments.
